paragraphs: I think most people think a personality is inherit, an ineffible thing
But I have had a friend who thinks a person can be defined by the things they do
I don't know answer. I think I'm a nervous, funny person

I hope you don't find this whole experiment to mean I am arrogant. I am really only doing this to become a better front-end developer, to a UI framework well, to learn barebones html CSS and javascript well.
